name: ElementaryGreeting
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: elementary greeting
des: This skill basically deals with the elementary greetings exchange between the user and Alexa. The user ask Alexa to open the skill. On responding to the same, the skill is revoked. Alexa, shares a warming greeting to the user. The user is given a choice if he wishes to greet a hello message or ask for a help. On the basis of the user response, Alexa greets/replies politely to the user. This skills basically help on in building personality development on small scale. But we cannot ignore the fact that just a small change in the direction of a sailing ship can take it to an absolutely different direction after travelling a long distance.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
